title: Lamb and cherry casserole
ingredients: ['225g (8 oz) streaky bacon, chopped', '15g (1/2 oz) butter', '1.4kg (3 lb) boneless leg or shoulder of lamb, cubed', '1 onion, sliced', '1 carrot, sliced', '1 stick celery, sliced', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '600ml (1 pt) full-bodied red wine', '1 teaspoon clear honey', '1 bouquet garni', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste', '450g (1 lb) sour red cherries, stoned']
